Democratisation ≠ universal participation

tooling makes the on-ramp easier for those on the edge, curious but without the (old)skills.

the desire to create doesnt come from a tool being easier to use

the limiting factor isnt just tech know-how, but human interest

fullText:
Just watched Bengio’s recent lecture and he had interesting insight:  Any AI with self-preservation puts it in competition with humans. That’s root of all evils. 

Big question: Is self-preservation an emergent property of intelligence? 

Humanity’s future depends on this answer.
